Great accommodations at a reasonable price. Close enough to restaurants and attractions on both sides of Mobile Bay. The condo was clean and nicely decorated and exactly as described in the listing. It was the perfect size for just one person. Great recommendations for things to do and places to eat, too. Easy check-in/out. Would definitely consider staying here next time I’m in the area.

Great place. Super clean and quiet. Plenty of restaurants and shopping close by. I would stay again.

Condo was in a great location and was clean. Took us a few minutes to find the exact unit though, but maybe we just misinterpreted the directions. The unit has a strange bathroom layout in that the toilet area is a step up from the vanity area so bring a nightlight if you go to the bathroom during the night. First night we had no issues at all. The second night however, the neighbor upstairs was walking heavily/stomping across the floor constantly from about 10:30 to at least 12:30 (confusing since it is such a small unit) so we were unable to sleep and then I never fell asleep after that until after 5am after more heavy walking around 4 am. No other reviews complained about the upstairs neighbor so maybe they had a guest in their unit?? I tried to read to relax but could not get bedside lamp to work. Bree was kind enough to mail back my pillow case after I left my pillow there and was sympathetic to the lack of sleep and planned to talk with the neighbor.

The condo was very nice and matched perfectly to the cleanliness that was shown in the pictures. The host were very responsive and engaged in answering any and all questions I had about the place. Overall a great stay and I would most definitely would stay here again.
Bree is a very good host. She made local recommendations and checked in with me to make sure I had everything that I needed.
